tips.text: Vermont tofu salad is off the hook!
House salad with Goat cheese is a great salad. I rarely would comment on a salad.

location.crossStreet: btwn N Winooski Ave and Church St
formattedAddress: 150 Cherry St (btwn N Winooski Ave and Church St)

tips.text: Salads are amazing!
They can convert any of their sandwiches into salads.
A salad? Milk?  Wine?  Cabot cheese? They have it all I think! !
The beet salad is fantastic. Try the sangria, too. Yum.
The fries with aioli, farm salad, and vermont cheddar ale soup!

location.crossStreet: btwn S Winooski Ave & Church St
formattedAddress: 211 College St (btwn S Winooski Ave & Church St)

tips.text: By far the best salad bar (& soup & hot bar) downtown!
Salad rolls!!
Red Onion is still one of my fave sandwich spots. Famous for their "Red Onion" sandwich, which is really tasty, another great (and lighter) option is their chicken salad on a baguette or honey oat.
You can add a burger patty to your salad !!
Great unlimited salad
Chicken salad sandwiches and roast beef is the best here
BBQ Chopped Chicken Salad ftw!
The Skinny Salad is one of the best big salads in town!
I usually come to pick up a salad, but they have the best desserts in town!
Lunch options are also fire, definitely try the grilled chicken with warm orzo salad
Salad and minestrone soup!
At Panera, a good clean salad is so much more than a bowl of something green. More than just one flavor or texture or color. The New Southwest Chile Lime Ranch Salad.
tips.compactText: The New Southwest Chile Lime Ranch salad from Panera is so much more than green.

formattedAddress: 16 Church St (btwn Pearl St & Cherry St)

tips.text: Chicken Caesar salad
New England salad is killer
Great buffalo chicken salad!
Worst menu options ever. There is literally nothing aside from a salad that a gluten free person can eat, no fries, no appetizers that aren't fried. What sort of pizza shop doesn't sell French fries?
Chicken salad = danger. I'm just sayin. (not in a good way)
Live music and salad bar
Oriental chicken salad is always good
Steak Tartare and Caesar Salad! Dry rubbed bone in NY strip Steak a must, if you are serious about your meat! Awesome ambience amazing food! By the way the Cosmopolitans are perfectly made! A must!
Intervale - great panini with nice green salad
I couldn't decide what I wanted so I went with the employee suggestion  - chicken salad with on maple oat nut bread I believe. Delicious! I will definitely be going back!
